flawed_nl_solution:
He runs at .1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
While the album is playing he can run 4 miles because 40 x 0.1 = <<40*0.1=4.0>>4.0
He has to run 2 miles without the album because 6 - 4.0 = <<6-4.0=2.0>>2.0
Without music he runs 1/15 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 1/15
He will run the remaining 2 miles in 30 minutes because 2.0 / (1/16) = <<2.0/(1/16)=32.0>>32.0
It will take him 70 minutes in total because 40 + 32.0 =<<40+32.0=72.0>>72.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4/60, not 1/16. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
